• Th e  PNRM should be scheduled at a regular time each month (or week) so that the participants can plan their
schedule accordingly. The dates of the meetings should be distributed well in advance (e.g. yearly).
Who should attend the PNRM? 
• An attendance register should be developed that specifies the people (designation) that should be present at the
